price: 13. Markaan maqallay Hanuunkana waan rumaynay, qofkii rumeeya Rabbigi (Alle) kama baqo nuqsaan ajar ama dulmi midna.
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lammā samiʿ'nā al-hudā āmannā bihi faman yu'min birabbihi falā yakhāfu bakhsan walā rahaqan
